resource_dependency.realTimeSolarGenerationAPI: GET /api/solar/generation - Returns current solar power generation in kW.

function: Display real-time solar power generation value fetched from backend API.
static_description: A card component with a honeydew background and dark olive green border showing the label 'Solar Generation', an icon referenced as solarPanelIcon, and a numeric value field displaying the latest solar power generation in kW.

interaction_and_states.description: Component fetches data from realTimeSolarGenerationAPI on mount and displays the returned value.
Every 5 seconds, the component re-fetches data from realTimeSolarGenerationAPI and updates the displayed value without page reload.

interaction_and_states.description: Component fetches data from realTimePowerConsumptionAPI on mount and displays the returned value.

resource_dependency.historicalDataQueryAPI: GET /api/history?start={startDate}&end={endDate} - Returns historical records between two timestamps.
resource_dependency.dateRangePickerLibrary: React Date Range Picker library or equivalent

function: Allow users to query historical solar data by specifying a custom date range.
static_description: Two date input fields labeled 'Start Date' and 'End Date' with calendar pickers rendered via dateRangePickerLibrary, placed within a form container with a honeydew background and dark olive green text labels.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens a calendar widget allowing selection of start date; selected value populates the corresponding input field.
Opens a calendar widget allowing selection of end date; selected value populates the corresponding input field.
Triggers a request to historicalDataQueryAPI with selected dates as parameters, then passes results to downstream charting components.

resource_dependency.chartAnalysisLibrary: Chart.js or similar JavaScript charting library
resource_dependency.historicalTrendDataSchema: Database table schema: id (serial primary key), timestamp (timestamptz), solar_generation_kw (float), power_consumption_kw (float), battery_percentage (int)

function: Visualize historical trends of solar metrics using line charts.
static_description: Three separate line charts rendered with chartAnalysisLibrary inside containers styled with honeydew background and dark olive green borders. Charts represent Solar Generation (kW), Power Consumption (kW), and Battery Percentage (%) over time.

interaction_and_states.description: Charts render default view with last 7 days of data upon initial load.
Receives filtered dataset from historicalDataQueryAPI and redraws all three charts dynamically with updated datasets.
Displays tooltip showing exact metric value and timestamp at hovered data point.

resource_dependency.dataFetchingService: Axios or native fetch API implementation

function: Ensure all frontend data originates exclusively from backend APIs, eliminating hardcoded or mock values.
static_description: Not a visible UI element but a configuration ensuring all data retrieval methods use dataFetchingService pointing to defined endpoints.

resource_dependency.postgresConnectionConfig: Environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
resource_dependency.databaseSchemaDefinition: Tables: realtime_metrics(id serial PK, timestamp timestamptz, solar_generation_kw float, power_consumption_kw float, battery_percentage int); historical_metrics same structure with indexing on timestamp.

function: Establish secure connection to PostgreSQL database using provided credentials and define required tables.
static_description: Not a visible UI element but a server-side setup defining how backend services connect to postgres using postgresConnectionConfig and initialize databaseSchemaDefinition.

function: Apply consistent honeydew background color across entire dashboard UI.
static_description: All main layout wrappers and page containers inherit their background-color style from globalCSSVariables.

resource_dependency.componentStyleRules: CSS class definitions setting text color, border color, and accent elements to dark olive green (#556B2F)

function: Style all interactive and informational components uniformly with dark olive green theme.
static_description: Text labels, borders, buttons, and other UI controls utilize componentStyleRules to apply #556B2F coloring throughout.

resource_dependency.metricsVisualizationLibrary: Chart.js or D3-based solution for rendering time-series data

function: Render visually distinct charts representing solar-related metrics over time.
static_description: Three side-by-side panels each containing one chart rendered by metricsVisualizationLibrary, titled respectively 'Solar Output', 'Energy Usage', and 'Battery Status', each featuring corresponding icons from metricIcons.

interaction_and_states.description: Charts resize responsively maintaining readability on desktop and tablet breakpoints.
(Optional future feature) Click legend items to hide/show individual metrics in multi-line charts.

resource_dependency.dateSelectionUIComponent: Custom-built or third-party date picker supporting dual-calendar selection
resource_dependency.dateFormatterUtility: JavaScript utility formatting ISO strings into human-readable formats

function: Provide intuitive date range selector enabling historical data filtering.
static_description: Horizontal inline form group comprising two inputs labeled 'From' and 'To', populated with formatted dates using dateFormatterUtility, integrated with dateSelectionUIComponent.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking either input opens associated calendar modal for date selection.
Clicking 'Apply' submits the chosen date pair to trigger historicalDataQueryAPI call.

resource_dependency.liveUpdateMechanism: WebSocket connection or polling mechanism every 5 seconds

function: Automatically refresh real-time metric values periodically without manual intervention.
static_description: Background process continuously invoking liveUpdateMechanism to update displayed values in real-time cards.

interaction_and_states.description: At fixed intervals, triggers refetch of real-time APIs and updates DOM elements accordingly.

resource_dependency.mobileFirstGridSystem: CSS Grid or Flexbox-based responsive layout system

function: Ensure optimal display experience across desktop and tablet screen sizes.
static_description: Layout adjusts column count and spacing using responsiveBreakpoints and mobileFirstGridSystem when viewed on tablets vs larger screens.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout recalculates grid dimensions and reflows child components smoothly during viewport resizing.

resource_dependency.installScriptCommand: "install:all": "cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install"

function: Enable unified installation of frontend and backend dependencies through single command.
static_description: Defined under scripts section in root package.json file referencing installScriptCommand.

interaction_and_states.description: Executing 'npm run install:all' sequentially installs packages in frontend and backend directories.

resource_dependency.devScriptDefinition: "dev": "concurrently \"cd frontend && npm run dev\" \"cd backend && npm run dev\""

function: Launch both frontend development server and backend application simultaneously.
static_description: Defined under scripts section in root package.json file utilizing concurrentExecutionTool as per devScriptDefinition.

interaction_and_states.description: Running 'npm run dev' spawns parallel processes launching frontend (typically on port 3000) and backend servers (on port 5000 or configured port).
